\doxysubsection{Detailed Description}
A utility class to wrap \mbox{\hyperlink{classit_1_1unical_1_1mat_1_1embasp_1_1languages_1_1datalog_1_1MinimalModel}{Minimal\+Model}} with useful methods and interface it with the parser.
